body_html: Right now there are two solutions: the slower tf.reverse_sequence followed by pulling out the 0th index, or using tf.gather_nd. Note that gather_nd does not currently have a gradient defined. We're working on that now, but it's not blocking. So I'm marking this as resolved.
body_text: Right now there are two solutions:  the slower tf.reverse_sequence followed by pulling out the 0th index, or using tf.gather_nd.  Note that gather_nd does not currently have a gradient defined.  We're working on that now, but it's not blocking.  So I'm marking this as resolved.
body: Right now there are two solutions:  the slower `tf.reverse_sequence` followed by pulling out the 0th index, or using `tf.gather_nd`.  Note that `gather_nd` does not currently have a gradient defined.  We're working on that now, but it's not blocking.  So I'm marking this as resolved.
